<!-- Pull Request Template -->

## Summary
Describe the change.

## Related
Link any related issues or PRs.

## Checklist (required)
- [ ] Code compiles and unit tests pass.
- [ ] CHANGELOG entry added (if needed).
- [ ] E2E tests added under `tests/e2e` or `e2e/` that cover the feature (see E2E_TEST_GUIDELINES.md).
- [ ] `npm run test:e2e` or `make e2e` runs the new tests locally and in CI.
- [ ] Test plan added to this PR (what scenarios the E2E covers, how to run locally).

If E2E cannot be added, explain why and create a follow-up issue tracking the E2E addition.
